alert.note: Alert for Coastal Collier County; Inland Collier County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 12 at 3:26AM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Collier County through 400 AM EDT... At 326 AM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm capable of producing a landspout near West Toll Gate On Alligator Alley, or 7 miles south of Golden Gate Estates, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts and winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Ave Maria, Golden Gate Estates, Immokalee, Orangetree, Naples Manor, Lely Resort, Big Corkscrew Island, West Toll Gate On Alligator Alley, South Blocks Golde, Sunniland, Picayune Strand State Forest, Intersection I-75 And Everglades Blvd, Lake Trafford, and Lely. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes. Funnel clouds occasionally touch down and produce tornadoes or waterspouts. Move indoors and stay away from windows.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Collier County; Inland Collier County
